00021 #ifndef _CHPFileVersion_HEADER_
00022 #define _CHPFileVersion_HEADER_
00023 
00024 /*! \file CHPFileVersion.h Defines version types and functions to determine versions. */
00025 
00026 namespace affymetrix_chp_converter
00027 {
00028 /*! The list of available CHP file types/versions. */
00029 typedef enum _CHPFileVersion
00030 {
00031         /*! An unknown or unsupported version. */
00032         Unknown_Version,
00033 
00034         /*! This is the XDA version format supported by GCOS. */
00035         GCOS_XDA_Version,
00036 
00037         /*! This is the version 1 Calvin format. */
00038         Calvin_Version1,
00039 
00040         GCOS_Mas5_Version
00041 
00042 } CHPFileVersionType;
00043 
00044 
00045 /*! Provides for information about CHP file versions. */
00046 class CHPFileVersion
00047 {
00048 public:
00049 
00050         /*! Determines the version number of the file.
00051         * @param fileName The file name of the CHP file.
00052         * @return The file version.
00053         */
00054         static CHPFileVersionType DetermineCHPFileVersion(const char *fileName);
00055 };
00056 
00057 }
00058 
00059 #endif
